item.title: Video Game Trends that are Toxic
item.description: Some video games are good. And some suck. Maybe they could've been great and a lot of fun to play. Or maybe they already are fun to play, but are just poisoned with bad decisions from developers or publishers. There's a lot going on and its hard to pinpoint a single area that plagues the gaming industry by itself. Here's just a few trends: Alpha & Pre-Alpha releases Always Online - DRM - Digital Rights Management
